mapper.insert: insert into tchat_msg (sn, chat_room_id, sender_id, receiver_id, contents, status, send_date) values (seq_tchat_msg.nextval, #{chatRoomId}, #{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{contents}, #{status}, current_date)
mapper.select: select * from tchat_msg where sender_id = #{senderId} and receiver_id = #{receiverId} and status='MSST02' order by send_date
select count(*) as unread_msg from tchat_msg where receiver_id = #{userId} and status = 'MSST02'
